body: @alexbrainman, according to https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms737606(v=vs.85).aspx ConnectEx isn't available on Windows XP, yet my https://golang.org/cl/22101 deleted 1 of the 2 paths that checked whether ConnectEx was available. It seemed likely to break XP, or at least make XP go into the wrong code path. I think it just disabled the backup racer dial on XP, meaning timeouts wouldn't be reliable?
